tool.name: PhaBOX contamination
tool.help:
Check for contaminations / proviruses.
**Output**:
A tabular dataset with the following columns:
- Accession: the accession or the name of the input contigs. - Length: the length of input contigs. - Total_genes: number of genes in the contigs (predicted by prodigal-gv) - Viral_genes: number of viral marker genes - Prokaryotic_genes: number of prokaryotic marker genes - Kmer_freq: average frequency of 20-mer. This is a value to estimate the copy number of the genes; usually, the Kmer_freq of 99.9% virus is less than 1.25. - Contamination: - Provirus: Whether the sequence is a provirus - Pure_viral: High quality or Medium quality or Low quality
